現正作出割蓆宣言
The movement has recently found the need for a declaration of discipline code upon common consensus have been reached. This declaration will minimise any possibility on act of sabotage and infiltration by the regime and ensure certain level of safety to the activity itself

一，示威者不會惡意傷害任何無辜人士之性命財產。
The participant of the movement would not attack/penalise any innocent individual themself and their property
二，示威者不強姦，不搶劫。
The participant of the movement would not commence any sexual indecent act such as raping or sexual assault nor any criminal act of robbing or related.
三，示威者對報導事實的記者，醫護，外國朋友等一律表示尊重。
The participant of the movement would respect and protect individuals who is journalists with genuine purpose on reporting the truth , any medicals practitioners or any foreigner in need at all scene under any condition.
四，示威者作出的一切行為皆對準港共極權或任何助長港共極權之人士、團體和機構。
The participant of the movement would only target on individuals/group who has been demonstrate behaviour that either involve in suppression of Hong Kong democracy or safety of the participant at scene.
